review: Tough to recommend. The UI is nice and what it offers is good but the hardware doesn't handle Wifi very well. It will drop signal and buffer more then it needs to compared to my Chromecast, PS3, and Chinese branded Android stick. If it didn't buffer as much or drop signal I would fully recommend it.

review: Love being able to watch Prime Instant Video AND Netflix...the Chromecast I had before was not compatible with Amazon. Definitely plug the power supply into an outlet rather than the TV...it'll cut out.

review: Can't believe how easy this was to set up.  Plug it in; connect to your WiFi,  watch the automatic tutorial, and then go!  Worked flawlessly.  It's great when something works quickly and easily, right out of the box.  Extremely happy so far...have had it for 2 hours and can't wait to see/watch more!

Should I return and order it again, or can it be recharged to my my account and save the wear and tear on the postal service?  A week later, Great Potential, but I constantly am told that my system does not have enough band width to support continuous streaming.  How much band width is required?
